an4.262:4.1: “Mendicants, when a mendicant has four qualities they’re not ready to frequent remote wilderness and jungle lodgings.
an4.262:4.3: They have sensual, malicious, and cruel thoughts; or they’re witless, dull, and stupid.
an4.262:4.4: When a mendicant has these four qualities they’re not ready to frequent remote wilderness and jungle lodgings.
an4.262:5.1: When a mendicant has four qualities they’re ready to frequent remote wilderness and jungle lodgings.
an4.262:5.3: They have thoughts of renunciation, love, and kindness; and they’re wise, bright, and intelligent.
an4.262:5.4: When a mendicant has these four qualities they’re ready to frequent remote wilderness and jungle lodgings.”
